title: Trimming, 18th century
medium: White and colored silk in uncut velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Shield with compartments, each containing a device, crown, and as a crest, a half-figure wearing a plumed hat.  In red, blue, yellow on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, 18th century.
18th century. White and colored silk in uncut velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-43.
